exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: unfold greet_safe. split. - intros [H1 [H2 [m H3 H4]]]. exists (NullHeap.heap), (H1, H2, m, H3, H4). reflexivity. - intros [b [pf H]]. destruct H as [H1 [H2 [m H3 H4 H5]]]. simpl in pf. inversion pf. subst. exists b, pf. reflexivity.
